summary:
Five years of experience in commercial software development for the Microsoft Windows platform and web-based environments. Extensive programming experience using ASP.NET, JavaScript, HTML and XML. Strong knowledge of WinForms, experience of using Infragistics Components. Solid background in Object-Oriented analysis and design. Good understanding of project management and software development life cycle. Microsoft certified professional developer.

Specialties:C#, SQL, JavaScript, .NET, ASP.NET WebForms, ASP.NET MVC, jQuery UI, WinForms, Test Driven Development, Object-oriented programming

career_history.description: Responsibilities: developed GUI using Silverlight 4.0 and ExtJS 3.3 framework; implemented web services using WCF; designed MS SQL database schema; reviewed developed code; configured MSBuild project;

projects.name: Report Manager
projects.description:
Web application which allows fund administrators to configure and maintain client portals providing access to information on investments to the funds' clients. Works as a single location for viewing all fund reports existing in Paladyne Suite.

Environment:
ASP.NET WebForms, Silverlight 4.0, ExtJS 3.3, HTML, CSS, WCF ,MS SQL Server 2008, Visual Studio 2010, IIS7.0, Team Foundation Server 2010
